title: Saturday Matinee: The Road to Now with Ken Burns
description:
In this week’s Saturday Matinee episode, we’re bringing you a podcast episode from a friend, interviewing a legend. Ben Sawyer and his co-host Bob Crawford from the podcast The Road To Now talk to Ken Burns about his newest documentary on Ernest Hemmingway.

Link to The Road to Now: https://www.theroadtonow.com/
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
